name: Lil' Gangsta Vs Uptown Zombies
description:
Zombies are moving in to Uptown! Lil Gangsta must hold it down till his crew arrive! Shoot and power your way through a zombie horde till the timer runs out. 

Lil' Gangsta Vs the Uptown Zombies is a kid friendly game. Explore the town and find some much needed power-ups. Time to prove your worth on da streetz.

FYI. This is a personal project developed entirely by one person. If you are enjoying the world and want to see more refinements and additions please let me know in the comments. Its something I may develop further...

Thanks for playing. 

Adam B.
